label: 権記
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: Diary of Fujiwara no Yukinari [971～1027], a celebrated calligrapher and ancestor of the Sesonji family.  He eventually became a Provisional Major Councelor (p. 389).  [藤原行成、世尊寺]
